attributes.action: Pause all payments for loans, mortgages, bills in case Government close down UK
attributes.additional_details: If Government or Parliament decided to lock down completely the Country, about 95% of all people in the UK will be affected, including all sorts of businesses. Almost all of us would not be able to keep up the regular payments, because the income stops coming in. All we not asking to write off, we asking to put it on hold, until the situation with coronavirus will be sorted out. Thanks
attributes.background: We, all people lives in UK, asking the Government and Parliament to put on HOLD all payments for bills, loans, mortgages for people, who cant keep up the payments if they not allowed go to work or for any business, who will be affected by that mater.
